    • Method Detail

      • getTypedCharacters

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> getTypedCharacters()
        Returns a list of all visible characters that were typed in the last snapshot. This list is in the order that they were typed.
        Returns:

      • isKeyPressed

        public boolean isKeyPressed(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key is currently pressed down. A key is pressed down from the snapshot that it is moved into its down position until the snapshot that it is released
        Parameters:
        key - KeyEvent int constant representing the key
        Returns:
        True if key is pressed down, false otherwise.

      • isKeyPressedShiftModifier

        public boolean isKeyPressedShiftModifier(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key is currently pressed down with the Shift modifier
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        True if the key is pressed down with the shift modifier

      • isKeyPressedCtrlModifier

        public boolean isKeyPressedCtrlModifier(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key is currently pressed down with the ctrl modifier
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        True if the key is pressed down with the ctrl modifier

      • isKeyPressedAltModifier

        public boolean isKeyPressedAltModifier(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key is currently pressed down with the alt modifier
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        True if the key is pressed down with the alt modifier

      • isKeyReleased

        public boolean isKeyReleased(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key was released. A release happens if the key was returned to its UP position during this snapshot
        Parameters:
        key - KeyEvent int constant representing the key
        Returns:
        True if key was released, false otherwise

      • isKeyReleasedShiftModifier

        public boolean isKeyReleasedShiftModifier(short key)
        Queries input snapshot to see if given key is currently released with the Shift modifier
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        True if the key is released with the shift modifier

      • isMouseDown

        public boolean isMouseDown()
        Queries the input snapshot to see if the mouse is currently down.
        Returns:
        True if the mouse is currently pressed down, otherwise false

      • isMouseClicked

        public boolean isMouseClicked()
        Queries the input snapshot to see if the mouse was clicked.
        Returns:
        True if the mouse was clicked, otherwise false

        Returns:
        True if the mouse moved, false otherwise
